name: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind GOTY Edition
description: OpenMW 0.45.0 64 bit engine and game data from Steam + official plug-ins from bethsoft.com
notes: Upon first run, the Morrowind.ini file needs to be converted to openmw through the automated installer.  The modules for the main game also need to be placed in the proper order within the launcher; the steam installation seems to have them out of order by default.
content:
files:
- openmwarchive: https://github.com/OpenMW/openmw/releases/download/openmw-0.45.0/openmw-0.45.0-Linux-64Bit.tar.gz
- morrowinddata:
    filename: morrowinddata/
    url: $STEAM:22320:Data Files
- morrowindini:
    filename: morrowindini/
    url: $STEAM:22320:Morrowind.ini
- entertainers: https://cdn.bethsoft.com/elderscrolls/morrowind/other/entertainers.zip
- bittercoastsounds: https://cdn.bethsoft.com/elderscrolls/morrowind/other/bittercoastsounds.zip
- areaeffectarrows: https://cdn.bethsoft.com/elderscrolls/morrowind/other/area_effect_arrows.zip
- ebartifact: https://cdn.bethsoft.com/elderscrolls/morrowind/other/ebartifact.zip
- masterindex: https://cdn.bethsoft.com/elderscrolls/morrowind/other/masterindex.zip
- lefemmarmor: https://cdn.bethsoft.com/elderscrolls/morrowind/other/lefemmarmor1.1.zip
- adamantiumarmor: https://cdn.bethsoft.com/elderscrolls/morrowind/other/adamantiumarmor.zip
- firemoth: https://cdn.bethsoft.com/elderscrolls/morrowind/other/firemoth1.1.zip
game:
  exe: openmw-launcher
  ld_library_path: $GAMEDIR/lib
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: openmwarchive
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/data
    src: morrowinddata
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: morrowindini
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/data
    file: entertainers
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/data
    file: bittercoastsounds
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/data
    file: areaeffectarrows
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/data
    file: ebartifact
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/data
    file: masterindex
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/data
    file: lefemmarmor
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/data
    file: adamantiumarmor
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/data
    file: firemoth
